name: Bio Bullet
description:
You're on a monster hunt with dangerous Bio Bullets. When you load your gun, a timer will begin to count down. As the timer approaches 0 your bullets will deal more damage to the monster, but if you wait too long and the time goes over 0... your bullets will find a new target... YOU!

Controls:

Move: WSAD

Shoot: Left Click

(Made in 3 hours)
